name: Adventurers Guild (itch)
description:
CGDC Game Jam 2021 Entry

https://itch.io/jam/cgdc-speedgame-hardmode-2021

Version 1.1 - added audio
Version 1.0 - initial release

Make sure you have the VC 2015/2019 Redistributable installed from Microsoft.  If you don't have it you can download it from Microsoft here: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/the-latest-supported-visual-c-download... 

KNOWN ISSUES
- Crystal sword broken (doesn't do anything)
- Slimes don't always navigate to the player
- Player animations are really messed up
- Missing trapped local model (it's the player in t-pose)

Theme: Light & Reflections
Game Title: The Adventurer's Guild
Author: petrocket

To start the game open the Bin64vc142.Release folder and run GameLauncher.exe

CONTROLS

WASD to move
Mouse to look
Left mouse click to attack
Mirror shield reflects beams
Mirror sword reflects beams if you hit them, and the sword can damage glowing slimes
ALT + ENTER to go full screen
ESC to bring up options menu/quit

GOAL

Navigate the dungeon, picking up the sword, shield, key and then walk up to the locked cage to release the trapped local
